summary: An ordinance relating to the Water Dept. and authorizing the sale and removal of certain wind-thrown and damaged timber, together with other salvageable forest materials and standing old growth timber incidental to such removal, from city-owned lands in the NW 1/4 of the NW 1/4 of Section 36, Township 22 North, Range 9 East, W.M. in the Cedar River Watershed under contract with the Mountain Tree Farm Company.
